name: My Two Cents with Christian Sargent

episodes.title: Is Your Church a Cult? 5 Warning Signs You Shouldn't Ignore
episodes.description: Ever wonder if your church is straying from the path of faith? This episode delves into the murky world of cults, disguised as religious communities. We'll explore five red flags that could indicate your church is prioritizing control over genuine spiritual growth. Watch the YouTube video episode here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LOdfxzDyo6o This podcast is a production of Twelve17 Media.
